name: [AA] Vanguards
description:
VANGUARDS

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

The Vanguards are designed to be a primary scouting and early raiding force for AA. Vanguards are required to scout every base before a raid happens, and give information on said base along with the group that the base is for. Vanguards also patrol the forums, informing AA of the happenings of the clan world.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

APPLICATIONS: https://forum.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=207022817

HANDBOOK: https://forum.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=207023290#207023322

MEMBER CAP: 10/15

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Who Dares, Wins.
